item.title: 2016 in Review
item.description: Some of the links are affiliate links to Amazon. I only recommend what I use. At last February. Finished my PhD dissertation, so can add Dr. in front of my name when ordering a Gatwick Express train ticket. Also makes for a cooler email signature. So far has been the only differences Iâ€™ve seen in the year Work February-December Started working as a consultant in London, almost the day after delivering the PhD presentation.
